rule.name: Assignment In Conditional Check
rule.description: Check for an assignment inside a conditional. It's probably a mistaken equality comparison.

rule.name: Case Missing Else Check
rule.description: Check that case statements have an else statement so that all cases are covered.

rule.name: Class Line Count Check
rule.description: Check that the number of lines in a class is below the threshold.

rule.name: Class Name Check
rule.description: Check that class names match convention.

rule.name: Cyclomatic Complexity Block Check
rule.description: Check that the cyclomatic complexity of all blocks is below the threshold.

rule.name: Cyclomatic Complexity Method Check
rule.description: Check that the cyclomatic complexity of all methods is below the threshold.

rule.name: Empty Rescue Body Check
rule.description: Check that there are no empty rescue blocks.

rule.name: For Loop Check
rule.description: Check that for loops aren't used (Use Enumerable.each instead)

rule.name: Method Line Count Check
rule.description: Check that the number of lines in a method is below the threshold.

rule.name: Method Name Check
rule.description: Check that method names match convention.

rule.name: Module Line Count Check
rule.description: Check that the number of lines in a module is below the threshold.

rule.name: Module Name Check
rule.description: Check that module names match convention.

rule.name: Parameter Number Check
rule.description: Check that the number of parameters on a method is below the threshold.
